comments:
Eclipse RC3 200406192000  CDT 200406240301  IBM JRE 1.4.2 J9 (June23)

After clicking "Finish" on the project wizard for creating a Managed C 
project,  I got the following core exception (Build Automatically was On and 
the workspace was clean) :

!SESSION Jun 24, 2004 11:02:32.531 ---------------------------------------------
eclipse.buildId=I200406192000
java.fullversion=J2RE 1.4.2 IBM J9 build 20040610 (JIT enabled)

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.resources 2 75 Jun 24, 2004 11:02:32.578
!MESSAGE Errors during build.
!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.cdt.managedbuilder.core 2 75 Jun 24, 2004 11:02:32.578
!MESSAGE Errors running builder "Generated Makefile Builder" on project MgdC.
!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.cdt.managedbuilder.core 2 1 Jun 24, 2004 11:02:32.578

Only happens when the Managed C or C++ project is empty.   If there is a cpp 
file in it, it will not happen.

Just sends a message to the status monitor rather than passing an exception 
back to the build manager.
